request.description:
### Description: This is Get Example API * * * #### Hak Akses: * All * * * ### Note: * Jika akses untuk halaman utama (halaman yang akan diakses oleh pengguna) maka gunakan parameter is_aktif=1 supaya data yang tampil hanya data yang aktif * * * ### Request Header : * NONE * * * ### Request Parameter: | **Key** | **Status** | **Description** | | --- | --- | --- | | limit | Optional | \-1 : No Limit
Minimum : 1
Default : 10 | | page | Optional | Default : 1 | * * *

### Description: This is Get Example API * **Who Can Access?** * All * * * ### Request Header : | **Key** | **Status** | **Description** | | --- | --- | --- | | Authorization | Mandatory | JWT {*token}*
Tanpa kurung kurawal | * * * ### Request Parameter: | **Key** | **Status** | **Description** | | --- | --- | --- | | Parameter1 | Optional | This is Parameter 1 | * * * ### File URL: * https://{{url}}/{{endpoint}}/blueprint/media/file_name

### Description: API Insert Data * * * #### Hak Akses : * All * * * ### Request Header : | **Key** | **Status** | **Description** | | --- | --- | --- | | Authorization | Mandatory | JWT {*token}*
Tanpa kurung kurawal | * * * ### Request Body (JSON Format): | **Key** | **Status** | **Description** | | --- | --- | --- | | Parameter1 | Mandatory | This is Parameter 1 | * * *

### Description: This is Update Example API * * * #### Hak Akses: * All * * * ### Request Header : | **Key** | **Status** | **Description** | | --- | --- | --- | | Authorization | Mandatory | JWT {*token}*
